Syntax
[Name("🎮Games")]
[Remarks("3")]
public class ConnectFourModule : MultiplayerGameModule<C4Game>, IModuleBase

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

StartConnectFour(SocketGuildUser)

Declaration
[Command("connect4")]
[Alias(new string[]{"c4", "four"})]
[Priority(1)]
[Remarks("Play Connect Four with another user or the bot")]
[Summary("You can choose a guild member to invite as an opponent using a mention, username, nickname or user ID. Otherwise, you'll play against the bot.\n\n You play by sending the number of a free cell (1 to 7) in chat while it is your turn, and to win you must make a line of 3 symbols in any direction\n\nDo `{prefix}cancel` to end the game or `{prefix}bump` to move it to the bottom of the chat. The game times out in case of extended inactivity.\n\nYou can also make the bot challenge another user or bot with `{prefix}c4 vs <opponent>`")]
public Task StartConnectFour(SocketGuildUser opponent = null)
Parameters

Discord.WebSocket.SocketGuildUser opponent
